DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of booster dose of two commercially available vaccines used to prevent Haemophilus influenzae type b infections in children 365-569 days of age
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Safety of a Booster Dose of Monovalent Glycoprotein-Conjugated (Diptheria Toxin -CRM197) Hib Vaccine in 365-569 Days Old Healthy Infants
DOC.criteria: Infants 365569 days of age. Subjects who already received a booster dose of Hib vaccine. History of serious reaction(s) following vaccination. Any vaccination within 7 days of study vaccination. Known or suspected immune impairment.
